authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fromEmailAddress.name: fromEmailAddress
fromEmailAddress.description: The email address that the custom verification email is sent from
fromEmailAddress.ai_hint: The email address that the custom verification email is sent from

templateContent.name: templateContent
templateContent.description: The content of the custom verification email. The total size of the email must be less than 10 MB. The message body may contain HTML
templateContent.ai_hint: The content of the custom verification email. The total size of the email must be less than 10 MB. The message body may contain HTML

templateSubject.name: templateSubject
templateSubject.description: The subject line of the custom verification email
templateSubject.ai_hint: The subject line of the custom verification email

successRedirectionURL.name: successRedirectionURL
successRedirectionURL.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is successfully verified
successRedirectionURL.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

failureRedirectionURL.name: failureRedirectionURL
failureRedirectionURL.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is not successfully verified
failureRedirectionURL.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: textPart
options.description: The email body that will be visible to recipients whose email clients do not display HTML

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: textPart
options.description: The email body that will be visible to recipients whose email clients do not display HTML

options.name: subjectPart
options.description: The subject line of the email

options.name: htmlPart
options.description: The HTML body of the email

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

isBodyHtml.name: isBodyHtml
isBodyHtml.description: Whether body is HTML or simple text

templateDataUi.name: templateDataUi
templateDataUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

subjectPart.name: subjectPart
subjectPart.description: The subject line of the email
subjectPart.ai_hint: The subject line of the email

htmlPart.name: htmlPart
htmlPart.description: The HTML body of the email
htmlPart.ai_hint: The HTML body of the email

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromEmailAddress'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'templateName'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'templateContent'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'templateSubject'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'successRedirectionURL'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'failureRedirectionURL'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'templateName'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation IN ["update", "delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'templateName'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'customVerificationEmail' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'isBodyHtml'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'body'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromEmail'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'toAddresses'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' THEN SHOW parameter 'templateName'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromEmail'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' THEN SHOW parameter 'toAddresses'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' THEN SHOW parameter 'templateDataUi'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation IN ["send", "sendTemplate"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'template' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'template' AND operation IN ["update", "create", "get", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'templateName'
IF resource == 'template' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'subjectPart'
IF resource == 'template' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'htmlPart'
IF resource == 'template' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'template' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'template' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'template' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
